column1: Themes for release: Stability, Security, Simplicity

column1: Further differentiate performance characteristics associated with pod level QoS

column8: Enable a container to mount a volume rshared so that any mounts from inside the container are reflected in the host's mount namespace (this will enable, for example, containerization of volume plugins).

column6: This feature adds PVC reference to the volume stats in kubelet stats summary API. These volume usage metrics are also emitted in prometheus format.
